post_title: WTB: The following in 4 or higher
post_content:
Down to the last 10!!

Hi everyone, I need the following cards in 4 or higher to slay the Monster (well, 520 anyway).  I have many references available on this forum. [url]jcotgreave@gmail.com[/url] if you have any.

Thanks!
Jim

Ed Abbaticchio (Blue Sleeves)        
Ted Breitenstein        
Gavvy Cravath    
Harry Davis (Philadelphia, Davis on Front)   
Dutch Jordan (Atlanta)    
J.F. Kiernan        
Barney Pelty (Horizontal Photo)    
Germany Schaefer (Detroit)     
Charles Seitz    
Kaiser Wilhelm (Hands at Chest)
